price: Ey kullarım, bugün size bir korku yoktur, siz üzülmezsiniz de.
arabic: يَٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yāʿibādi lā khawfun ʿalaykumu al-yawma walā antum taḥzanūna
